name: Dogger (NodeBrad)
description:
This is a game I made for a University project where
we had to recreate Frogger in Unity.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to move
H to Reset High Score
ESC to Exit

Artwork Credits:

Tilesets - limezu.itch.io
Dog Sprites - Dawn @wawaboopboop
Font - Daydream by DoubleGum
